deleterecord.sas
Go to the documentation of this file.
1/**
2 @file
3 @brief Delete the records according to GRP_CODIGO value
4
5 <h4> Service Inputs </h4>
6
7 <h5> work.from_ng </h5>
8
9 |GRP_CODIGO:$32.|
10 |---|
11 |`SOMEVALUE `|
12
13
14 <h4> SAS Macros </h4>
15 @li mp_abort.sas
16 @li insertevent.sas
17 @li deleterecord.sas
18 @li messagebe.sas
19
20**/
21
22
23/* get data from frontend */
24%webout(FETCH)
25
26/* extract variable from input table */
27%let GRP_CODIGO=0;
28data _null_;
29 set work.from_ng;
30 call symputx('GRP_CODIGO',GRP_CODIGO);
31run;
32
33/* abort if variable not found */
34%mp_abort(iftrue= (&GRP_CODIGO=0)
35 ,mac=&_program
36 ,msg=%str(Debe ingresar un código de segmento)
37)
38
39/* insert the event */
40%InsertEvent(GRP_CODIGO="&GRP_CODIGO",
41 LOG_EVENTO="El código &GRP_CODIGO ha sido eliminado",
42 LOG_USUARIO="&_METAPERSON",
43 LOG_TIPO_EVENTO="005"
44)
45
46/* delete the records */
47%DeleteRecord(&GRP_CODIGO)
48
49/* return work.response from viewrecord macro */
50%webout(OPEN)
51%webout(obj,response)
52%webout(CLOSE)
